title: Trans-am Riser Clear Color Body 1/60 (scale) Perfect Grade
description: Clear exterior parts for enjoying PG Transam Riser as a clear color kit appeared! From Mobile Suit Gundam 00

title: Strike Freedom Gundam 1/60 (scale) Perfect Grade
description: The Strike Freedom Gundam from Gundam Seed Destiny makes its debut into the PG line featuring brand new styling with extreme articulation and unprecedented mechanical detail.

title: Gundam Seed Astray Red Frame 1/60 (scale) Perfect Grade
description: Secretly in development for 4 years, the PG Gundam Astray Red Frame makes its big debut.

title: Gundam Seven Sword/G Gundam 00 1/60 (scale) Perfect Grade
description: Under the supervision of its original designer, Kanetake Ebikawa, the 00 Gundam is re-introduced to the Perfect Grade.

title: Barbatos Gundam 1/100 (scale) Master Grade
description: The 4th form of Gundam Barbatos from (Gundam Iron-Blooded Orphans) appears in the prestigous Master Grade line!

title: Gundam Dynames 1/100 (scale) Master Grade
description: The long awaited Gundam dynamic from Gundam 00 is finally available as a master grade.

title: Dual Gundam 1/100 (scale) Master Grade
description: The new X-100 frames allow the kit an incredible range of motion, even when it wears the Assault shroud.

title: Gundam MK2 1/100 (scale) Master Grade
description: The Gundam Mk 2 Titans Ver 2.0 from (Zeta Gundam) features styling and engineering found on the previously released larger PG Gundam MK 2.

title: Gundam Vidar 1/144 (scale) High Grade
description: A stylish new mobile suit equipped with a saber is launching from the 2nd season of the popular Iron Blooded Orphans series!

title: Zaku 2 Char Red Comet 1/144 (scale) High Grade
description: The red Zaku used by Char Aznable as seen in (Gundam the origin) And the original Gundam TV series returns in a new package along with new armaments!

title: RX-79 Ground Type Gundam 1/144 (scale) High Grade
description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit, amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Eaque, ex?This kit’s armor parts features new designs, recreating the Gundam Ground Type’s iconic asymmetrical chest Unit.

title: Shining Gundam 1/144 (scale) High Grade
description: Shining Gundam, the first Gundam for Neo Japan in the Gundam spinoff, Mobile Fighter G Gundam.
